metaDescription: Every child deserves the gift of reading. Our reading specialists turn the sentiment into a reality.
title: Contact Us
subtitle: Schedule a free phone consultation with our founder, Paul Tryon.
paragraph1: We know that finding the right tutor for your child can be a daunting task. We are here to help.
paragraph2: Fill out the form or contact us directly.
paragraph3: Paul Tryon will be in touch within 24 hours.
locations: Serving Boston, New York City, Westchester, and Long Island
